data.actual_result: you see a small yellow line above the green bar
data.expected_result: the green and yellow bar are the same size
data.short_description: Green voice sensitivity bar is 1 pixel smaller then the yellow bar. Only works with 80% zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - go to user settings - go to appearance - set zoom level to 80% - go to voice & video - look at the voice sensitivity bar
